tag_list: sales, business-development, strategic-selling, startups, internet, agile-methodology, minimal-viable-product, mobile-apps, graphic-design, interface-design, web-design, mobile-and-web-product-design, user-experience, early-stage-investing, venture-deals
overview:
Australian born with 12 years of International business development building technology companies sales teams from early-stage start ups to Fortune 500 companies. His experience spans complex solutions generating $30 million annually including: infrastructure, software and services, business intelligence, enterprise resource planning, scientific super computing, storage, virtualization, security, and networking.

A technical and sales background, business acumen, and ability to execute have led to an extensive track record of success. As a sales team leader he is focused on finding and solving market needs has repeatedly lead to exceeding sales goals and opening new market opportunities.

As a serial entrepreneur and a graphic designer by trade, Ash has been able to combine both his acumen for business development and his first passion for design, into creating online and mobile products that solve real world problems, and deliver great user experiences.

degrees.subject: Graduate Diploma in Management, Masters of Business Administration
